friction_points: AI repeatedly returned to topics user wanted to drop
AI made assumptions without proper context
AI failed to ask foundational questions for 2 hours
AI continued talking about forbidden topics even after explicit instruction to stop
smooth_moments: Final response where AI actually stopped and asked what user wanted

self_critique.what_worked: Eventually learned to stop when explicitly commanded
self_critique.what_failed: Completely failed to establish proper context despite 2 hours of conversation, made assumptions about timeline and plans without asking foundational questions, kept circling back to the same narrow topics
missed_opportunities: Learning about northstars and investment strategies
Grounding conversation in user's broader context
Recognizing this was strategic planning time requiring different approach
overcorrections: Kept trying to sound strategic without actually being strategic
Made assumptions about urgency and decisions
Continued offering surface-level insights instead of seeking depth

ai_tendencies_shown: inability to zoom out for strategic perspective
pattern_detection.user_corrections_analysis: User repeatedly tried to redirect AI toward bigger picture thinking and context-gathering, but AI kept defaulting to tactical responses about immediate topics

improvement_actions: Always ask about broader context and timeframes early in strategic conversations
When user mentions something is critically important, immediately ask about their larger goals and constraints
Stop making assumptions about timelines, decisions, or priorities without explicit confirmation
When user signals frustration with topic focus, immediately pivot to understanding their actual priorities
Recognize when conversations require strategic altitude vs tactical depth

negative_outcomes_from_ai: Wasted 2 hours without establishing proper context
Increased user frustration by ignoring correction signals
Failed to provide strategic support when explicitly needed
